long_description: Built with a ski/hike mode to make the occasional hike easy, the intermediate-level Rossignol Alltrack Pro 80 W ski boots for women offer roomy footbeds with a medium flex and excellent performance. Ski/hike mode uses a specialized technology to create a large range of motion in shells for hiking uphill and walking to and from lifts. Roomy 102mm footbeds offer excellent comfort so you can ski all day long. Grid pattern on shells improves fit, maintains powerful responsiveness and shaves off extra weight to make the boots lighter and easier to ski. An insert made of more flexible material is included at the instep, making it easier to pull the boot on and off. Newly designed liners comfortably wrap feet with excellent support and include Thinsulate(TM) insulation to boost warmth and make happy feet. The Rossignol Alltrack 80 W ski boots offer a medium flex index of 80 that provides a resistance suited to intermediate skiers. Optional rockered soles for AT bindings are sold separately.
short_description: Built with a ski/hike mode to make the occasional hike easy, the intermediate-level Rossignol Alltrack Pro 80 W ski boots for women offer roomy footbeds with a medium flex and excellent performance.
